title: Women's 1000 m - Speed Skating Grenoble 1968 Winter Olympics
table: {"0":{"0":null,"1":"Women's 1000 m 1968","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":null,"6":null,"7":null,"8":"4.","9":"5.","10":"6.","11":"7.","12":"8.","13":"9.","14":"10.","15":"11.","16":"12.","17":"13.","18":"-","19":"15.","20":"16.","21":"17.","22":"-","23":"19.","24":"20.","25":"21.","26":"22.","27":"23.","28":"24.","29":"25.","30":"26.","31":"27.","32":"28.","33":"29.","34":null,"35":null,"36":"Women's 1000 m - Speed Skating - Grenoble 1968 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes). Skaters had to change lanes in the back straightaway of each lap in order to skate an equal distance. The skater on the outer lane had the right of way and the skater leaving the inner lane should avoid collision. The Olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race. Event facts: Women's 1000 m competition was held at the Anneau de Vitesse, Parc Paul Mistral and 29 athletes participated in the event.","37":null,"38":"These results for Women's 1000 m - Grenoble 1968 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","39":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Women's 1000 m 1968","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Carolina Geijssen","6":"Lyudmila Titova","7":"Dianne Holum","8":"Kaija Mustonen","9":"Irina Yegorova","10":"Sigrid Sundby","11":"Jeanne Ashworth","12":"Kaija-Liisa Keskivitikka","13":"Kirsti Biermann","14":"Christina Kaiser","15":"Lasma Kaouniste","16":"Ruth Schleiermacher","17":"Elisabeth van den Brom","18":"Lisbeth Berg","19":"Christina Lindblom","20":"Hildegard Sellhuber","21":"Evi Sappl","22":"Martine Ivangine","23":"Ylva Hedlund","24":"Doreen McCannell","25":"Marcia Parsons","26":"Arja Kantola","27":"Jennifer Fish","28":"Marie-Louise Perrenoud","29":"Misae Takeda","30":"Sachiko Saito","31":"Wendy Thompson","32":"Patricia Demartini","33":"Patricia Tipper","34":null,"35":null,"36":"Women's 1000 m - Speed Skating - Grenoble 1968 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes).
